name: Doko Demo Issyo
description: Doko Demo Issyo is a hybrid of virtual pet and chat toy. It features several characters collectively referred to as “Pokepi” (Pocket People), including a white cat named Toro Inoue, a rabbit named Jun Mihara, and a dog named Pierre Yamamoto. Toro went on to be a PlayStation mascot in Japan. The game revolves around the use of the PocketStation accessory to take your Pokepi around with you, where you can chat and interact with them.

releases.comments: PocketStation Mo Issyo game & PocketStation bundle release
